metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010315 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: WavPack 5.1 and earlier is affected by: CWE 369: Divide by Zero. The impact is: Divide by zero can lead to sudden crash of a software/service that tries to parse a .wav file. The component is: ParseDsdiffHeaderConfig (dsdiff.c:282). The attack vector is: Maliciously crafted .wav file. The fixed version is: After commit https://github.com/dbry/WavPack/commit/4c0faba32fddbd0745cbfaf1e1aeb3da5d35b9fc.

criterions.comment: wavpack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
